name: eGreen Web Meter
author: eGreen, Mauro Baptista

sections.description:
Transform your website into a carbon neutral space.

What are the key benefits?

  • Get your website to be a green site, friendly to environment. (Not only your web hosting but also the network and your customer’s devices).
  • Build brand awareness and recognition by showcasting your commitment to sustainability.
  • Get more traffic, more customers and more visibility with a certified green website.
  • Improve your visitor engagement, they are part of the green solution.

Requirements

  • At least PHP 5.4.0
  • A valid account for your website on https://egreen.green/
sections.installation:
1. Upload all files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the eGreen Web Meter plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to (https://www.egreen.green/)
  4. Click on Sign Up Now
  5. Fill the form and click on Register
  6. It’s done
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Data: 07/28/2016
  • Updated cBoiler Plate
  • Fixed issue with undefined variable
  • Included option to choose where the web meter will be shown
  • Included option to add a padding on the web meter

1.0.0

  • Data: 02/04/2016
  • First Release
